This message contains the contents of any Galileo Search and Rescue (SAR) Short ReturnLink Message detected by the receiver.

column7: Identifier of transmitting satellite (see SatelliteNumbering)
Beacon identifier (60 bits), with bytes orderedby earliest transmitted (most significant) first.Top four bits of first byte are zero.
Parameters (16 bits), with bytes ordered byearliest transmitted (most significant) first.
